short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualizer the CLS of any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will highlight and visualize the Cumulative Layout Shift.

Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) is an important, user-centric metric for measuring visual stability because it helps quantify how often users experience unexpected layout shiftsâ€”a low CLS helps ensure that the page is delightful.

Unfortunately the CLS is a pain to debug without visualisation
